segment.source: Audit Application Group Management (Windows 10)
segment.target: Audit Application Group Management (Windows 10)

segment.source: This topic for the IT professional describes the advanced security audit policy setting, Audit Application Group Management, which determines whether the operating system generates audit events when application group management tasks are performed.
segment.target: This topic for the IT professional describes the advanced security audit policy setting, Audit Application Group Management, which determines whether the operating system generates audit events when application group management tasks are performed.

segment.source: Audit Application Group Management
segment.target: Audit Application Group Management

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows Server 2016
segment.target: Windows Server 2016

segment.source: Audit Application Group Management generates events for actions related to application groups, such as group creation, modification, addition or removal of group member and some other actions.
segment.target: Audit Application Group Management generates events for actions related to application groups, such as group creation, modification, addition or removal of group member and some other actions.

segment.source: Application groups are used by Authorization Manager.
segment.target: Application groups are used by Authorization Manager.

segment.source: Audit Application Group Management subcategory is out of scope of this document, because Authorization Manager is very rarely in use and it is deprecated starting from Windows Server 2012.
segment.target: Audit Application Group Management subcategory is out of scope of this document, because Authorization Manager is very rarely in use and it is deprecated starting from Windows Server 2012.

segment.source: 4783(S): A basic application group was created.
segment.target: 4783(S): A basic application group was created.

segment.source: 4784(S): A basic application group was changed.
segment.target: 4784(S): A basic application group was changed.

segment.source: 4785(S): A member was added to a basic application group.
segment.target: 4785(S): A member was added to a basic application group.

segment.source: 4786(S): A member was removed from a basic application group.
segment.target: 4786(S): A member was removed from a basic application group.

segment.source: 4787(S): A non-member was added to a basic application group.
segment.target: 4787(S): A non-member was added to a basic application group.

segment.source: 4788(S): A non-member was removed from a basic application group.
segment.target: 4788(S): A non-member was removed from a basic application group.

segment.source: 4789(S): A basic application group was deleted.
segment.target: 4789(S): A basic application group was deleted.

segment.source: 4790(S): An LDAP query group was created.
segment.target: 4790(S): An LDAP query group was created.

segment.source: 4791(S): An LDAP query group was changed.
segment.target: 4791(S): An LDAP query group was changed.

segment.source: 4792(S): An LDAP query group was deleted.
segment.target: 4792(S): An LDAP query group was deleted.
